query:
SELECT
                s.id,
                s.title,
                s.cover_image_url,
                s.updated_at,
                s.last_chapter_found_in_storage
            FROM
                series s
            JOIN
                user_bookmarks ub ON s.id = ub.series_id
            WHERE
                ub.user_id = $1
            ORDER BY
                s.updated_at DESC
